description: Police investigate after the statue of the US first lady was targeted in her hometown on 4 July.
title: Melania Trump sculpture in Slovenia set on fire on US Independence Day
title_page: Melania Trump sculpture in Slovenia set on fire on US Independence Day - BBC News
maintext: The sculpture of Mrs Trump, which could be described as only bearing a crude likeness to the US first lady, was carved out of a tree trunk on the outskirts of Sevnica, her hometown in central Slovenia.
